title: Patch Notes
content: ts for different character heights in the dialogue with the zaith'isk at Créche Y'llek. Tweaked a couple of camera angles in the dialogues with Tusk and Bosk at the Emerald Grove. Adjusted some cameras to better suit different race heights in the dialogue with Halsin and Kagha. Added a fade-out on the mocap in the dialogue with Baelen in the Underdark. Fixed a pop in the dialogue with the githyanki patrol at the Mountain Pass. Tweaked the timing of animations to fix pops in the dialogue with Scr
